definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

History of Three Kingdoms (Korean: Samguk Sagi), the oldest extant Korean history, compiled under Kim Busik 金富軾|金富轼[Jin1 Fu4 shi4] in 1145. The three kingdoms are Goguryeo 高句麗|高句丽[Gao1 gou1 li2], Baekje 百濟|百济[Bai3 ji4], Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2].

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民當家作主成爲黨的執政史和國史的鮮明主題。

sentences.english: This series of lectures forms part of a complete course on French history.
sentences.chinese: 這一系列的演講爲一門法國史課程的一部分。

sentences.english: Hoskins once called him), but otherwise to teenagers it all seems relatively dull.
sentences.chinese: 而此外的英國史對青少年而言似乎相對乏趣可陳。

sentences.english: As a result of orthodoxy, then all the history of the old China of an extremely brief period of writing.
sentences.chinese: 由於正統觀念作怪，舊中國史將這一段寫的極其簡略。

sentences.english: After the Yuan Dynasty, only without the national history of the Record.
sentences.chinese: 元代以後，則只有實錄而無國史了。

sentences.english: Zheng Qiao is a worthwhile and advertent person in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 鄭樵是中國史上很值得注意的人。

sentences.english: You mean it can tell me 500 years of Chinese history?
sentences.chinese: 你是說故宮能向我講述500年的中國史嗎？

sentences.english: She's still giving the toughest English history exams in the school and loving every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 她還是在學校裏出最難的英國史考試題，且樂此不疲。

sentences.english: The intonation of poems and quoting poems in the Spring and Autumn period were a special culture phenomenon of Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 春秋“賦詩引詩”，是中國史上一種特殊的文化現象。

sentences.english: Premier Yu presents a military sword to President Stroessner of Paraguay .
sentences.chinese: 俞院長贈送軍刀給巴國史託斯納爾總統。

sentences.english: The 1st Female Emperor in Chinese History.
sentences.chinese: 中國史上唯一的女皇帝。

sentences.english: His father is an expert on Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 他父親是中國史方面的專家。
